Music

Kyle wrote, recorded, and produced his first EP, Look At Me, and released it in September 2018 under the name Kale. He recorded the vocals in the basement of his childhood home and produced the songs using ProTools. Instrumentals were created using a piano, a microKorg, and a variety of software synths. It is now available for streaming and purchase on Spotify, Apple Music, iTunes, and anywhere else music is available. Following his first EP, he took some time to focus and polish his recording, production, and songwriting skills both on his own, and while working an internship at a recording studio in Cambridge, MA. He has since released two more singles and has a lot more on the way!
